# Canadian Air and Precipitation Monitoring Network – Flat Valley

**Reference Number:** cb-571-34254689
**Contracting Entity:** Environment and Climate Change Canada

**Background:**
Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) seeks daily technical support from a qualified contractor for the Canadian Air and Precipitation Monitoring Network (CAPMoN) Flat Valley site, located in Alberta, Canada. This contract requires a contractor to attend the site seven days a week for 52 weeks a year to retrieve and process precipitation and/or air samples.

**Scope of Work:**

As part of the contract, the contractor must perform daily technical support and maintenance tasks at the CAPMoN Flat Valley site. These tasks include:

* Servicing a wide range of sampling and monitoring equipment, including air filter sampling systems, ozone sampling systems, and nitrogen and sulfur dioxide sampling systems.
* Shipping samples to a designated laboratory for analysis.
* Performing routine site maintenance and upkeep, including snow removal, grass cutting, and equipment cleaning.

**Skills and Requirements:**

* Strong understanding of environmental research and monitoring equipment.
* Capable of performing routine equipment maintenance and repairs.
* Ability to work independently in a remote location.
* Good communication skills.

**Important Notes:**

* Training will be provided by ECCC technical staff on-site.
* The contractor will be responsible for shipping and receiving replacement equipment as required.
* The contractor must comply with all applicable regulations and procedures.

**Tender Documents:**

To obtain a copy of the tender documents, please visit [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34284/5000077309r_rfp_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34284/5000077309r_rfp_en.pdf).

**Contact Information:**

 Mitchell Palmer, Environment and Climate Change Canada
mitchell.palmer@ec.gc.ca, (613) 854-7053

**Submission Date:** 2024-04-02
Note: The submission date is the same as the closing date for the tender. Please ensure all submissions are received by this date.
